name: Parrosoft
short_description: arroExplore is an internet browser, designed not to compete with the great browsers out there, but rather to make browsing simpler. This browser was specifically created for individuals who have just started to use computers, but at the same time this browser is also for people who want a fast and lean web browser. What's really great about this browser is that it is specially made to be simple, fast, and easy to use. ParroExplore is unique in that it works at very fast speeds, while maintain a low memory footprint. Due to its intuitively simple functions this browser is very user friendly. This browser takes up minimal hard drive space and it doesnt strain processors, and other system resources. Another benefit of this web browser is that it rarely crashes in comparison to other commercial web browsers. All of the aforementioned reasons also makes it an excellent candidate for any type of computer hardware whether it be a new or old.
